EDF2130 - Child and Adolescent Developme.name: EDF2130 - Child and Adolescent Development for Educators

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Critical examination of developmental stages and characteristics of individuals from infancy through adolescence with application to learners in educational settings.

EDF2510 - Education and Nation Building:.name: EDF2510 - Education and Nation Building: American Historical Perspectives

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An historical analysis of why education remains critical to nation building in the U.S. and elsewhere, including education's impact on current policies and issues.

EDF2250 - Classroom Management for Subst.name: EDF2250 - Classroom Management for Substitute Teachers

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Instructional and classroom management strategies to optimize student learning and maximize the effectiveness of substitute teachers.
